onyomiExamples.meaning: surgery, operation, procedure, skill with one's hands, sleight of hand
master, expert, expert board game player (chess, go, shogi, etc.)
good at socializing, sociability, being a good mixer
knowing how to get on in the world, knowing the secret of success in life

kunyomiExamples.meaning: hand, arm, forepaw, foreleg, handle, hand, worker, help, trouble, care, effort, means, way, trick, move, technique, workmanship, hand, handwriting, kind, type, sort, one's hands, one's possession, ability to cope, hand (of cards), direction, move (in go, shogi, etc.)
